magic.subject: Your BlinkDisk Sign-In Code
magic.title: Sign-In to BlinkDisk
magic.preview: Here's your BlinkDisk magic sign-in code.
magic.body: You requested a magic sign-in code for BlinkDisk. To finish signing in, please copy the code below and paste it into the BlinkDisk desktop app:
magic.expiration: This code will expire in one hour. If you did not request a new code, you may safely ignore this email.

storageThreshold.subject: {{percentage}}% of BlinkDisk Cloud Storage used
storageThreshold.title: BlinkDisk Cloud Storage is running low
storageThreshold.preview: Your BlinkDisk Cloud storage is {{percentage}}% full.
storageThreshold.body: Your BlinkDisk Cloud storage is currently {{percentage}}% full. We recommend taking action to free up space or upgrade your plan to avoid backup interruption.
storageThreshold.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è You're using {{percentage}}% of your available storage space. Consider upgrading your plan.

storageFull.subject: BlinkDisk Cloud Storage Full
storageFull.title: BlinkDisk Cloud Storage Full
storageFull.preview: Your BlinkDisk Cloud storage is completely full and new files will not be backed up.
storageFull.body: Your BlinkDisk Cloud storage is completely full. No new files will be backed up until you free up space or upgrade your plan.
storageFull.urgent: üö® Your storage is completely full! New files cannot be backed up and you may lose data if your device fails.
storageFull.action: Please immediately upgrade your plan or delete old backups so new files can be backed up and your data stays protected.

cleanup.subject: You backups will be deleted in {{daysLeft}} day(s)
cleanup.title: You backups will be deleted in {{daysLeft}} day(s)
cleanup.preview: Your BlinkDisk Cloud subscription has been cancelled. Your backups will be deleted in {{daysLeft}} day(s).
cleanup.body: Your BlinkDisk Cloud subscription has been cancelled. Your backups and some vaults will be permanently deleted in {{daysLeft}} day(s). To prevent data loss, please resubscribe to BlinkDisk Cloud before the deletion date.
cleanup.warning: üö® Your backups and some vaults will be permanently deleted in {{daysLeft}} day(s). Resubscribe to keep your backups safe.
